A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While many people are hammering it right now I believe they just need to understand the plot better or stop crying about how it didn't go where they wanted. It was a good balance between the old (there are so many references to ESB - Luke & Yoda are so similar) and the new\, leaving the new characters to head off on their own. Not the best Star Wars ever and I left feeling a bit 'what the' but with time and thinking about it\, I got it !
